Self Employed Tax Information

USC is a tax you pay on your gross income. Everyone earning over €13,000 (2016, 2017) gross income is liable to pay USC.

PRSI contributions are paid at a rate of 4% on all income

Income Tax is paid: 20% for income upto 33,800 & 40% for income above 33,800
